data.title: Lead Systems Engineer Resume Samples
data.meta_description: Lead Systems Engineer Resume Samples and examples of curated bullet points for your resume to help you get an interview.
data.text:
Experience Experience

Houston, TX

Lead Systems Engineer

Houston, TX

Bayer-Harber

Houston, TX

Lead Systems Engineer

Works with managers and other team leads to improve development processes

Work with management to develop infrastructure strategies to support business initiatives

Create processes that enhance operation workflow and provide positive customer impact

Ensure each release meets well-defined quality standards by working closely with the development managers

Design and execute process improvement and project management methodologies

Developing continuous improvement activities by driving the implementation of process and product quality improvement initiatives

Distill volumes of data, analyzes performance results, diagnoses performance problems and clearly characterize system performance to stakeholders

Los Angeles, CA

Lead Systems Engineer Airbag Systems

Los Angeles, CA

Schowalter-Schaefer

Los Angeles, CA

Lead Systems Engineer Airbag Systems

Manage airbag systems sub-group’s projects and workload across several Systems Engineers (SE) and System Integration Engineers (SIE)

Develop and execute the sub-group’s budget for travel, training, and tests

Establish cross-functional work groups to address system level issues

Mentor, coach, and train airbag SE’s and SIE’s and provide extended influence over the rest of Occupant Protection group team members (Occupant & Crash Sensing, Seats & Belts, and Autonomous/PSDS subgroups)

Provide technical leadership and supervision across all airbag systems TRB’s and represent airbag Systems sub-group in Occupant Protection Systems CCB, and other SMT/Safety/Performance organizations’ forums (e.g., SMT Core-PDT’s, PAC committees, etc.)

Lead the airbag sub-group to develop, release, maintain and refine System Technical Specification and System FMEA for DAB/PAB/KAB/RRAB/SIAB Systems (plus an outright ownership for at least one of the systems)

Collaborate with Systems Safety, Feature Owners and/or Safety Vehicle Performance Owners to develop and improve customer focused vehicle level features and systems

present

Houston, TX

Senior Lead Systems Engineer

Houston, TX

Witting, Vandervort and Botsford

present

Houston, TX

Senior Lead Systems Engineer

present

Open to working shifts (morning, mid-afternoon, or evening; M-F, Su-Th or Tu-Sa) with occasional on-call duties

Demonstrated expertise in enterprise network administration and troubleshooting/analysis (DNS, IPsec VPN, BGP, Load Balancing)

Develop tools and automation for your team and others using modern coding platforms and techniques

Familiarity with popular stacks, frameworks and tech, like MEAN, ELK, Couchbase, SQL, Nginx, React, NUnit, Jenkins and Ansible

Budget and schedule management

Test/verification planning, development, and execution

Execute on service restoration and critical event procedures

Education Education

Skills Skills

Solid knowledge of interaction design principles, including usability and accessibility issues, and the impact of technical issues

Ability to apply detailed knowledge of organizational procedures to make independent decisions and serve as a credible resource for a senior management team

Ability to meet aggressive reliability, performance, cost, serviceability, and delivery targets

Knowledge of Industrial Networks (Ethernet, Modbus, OPC). CCNA certification is desirable

Detail oriented and organized; able to understand information systems and ensure accuracy of work

Solid worth ethic and the ability to work in a mission critical environment

Strong Systems Engineering knowledge

Good understanding of Virtualization concepts and competitive positioning knowledge is essential

Strong oral and written communication skills, as well as strong interpersonal skills

Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to communicate at all levels

Create a Resume in Minutes
